name: Milano'd
summary: Milano’d an interactive, text-based game that plunges players into the murky depths of corporate intrigue at a multinational corporation known for its glamorous facade and secretive dealings. As the newest employee, you are thrust into the annual Mega Raffle, an event surrounded by rumors of corruption and manipulation. Navigate through a web of deceit as you decide whether to expose the wrongdoing, exploit it for personal gain, or simply try to survive your day-to-day corporate life. Your choices will lead you through conversations with allies and adversaries alike, uncovering secrets that could alter the course of your career and the integrity of MilanoCorp. Each decision shapes the narrative, leading to multiple outcomes based on your moral compass and strategic cunning. Can you unravel the truth without losing yourself in the process?
